content: lion brand pattern # l30154 skill level intermediate level 3 heartland article #136 3 colors 6 balls total a redwood 3 balls 753 yards b acadia 2 balls 502 yards c olympic 1 ball 251 yards crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 1 ripple = about 4 in 10 cm wide 12 sts + 6 5 row = about 4 in 10 cm in ripple pattern 1 star = about 3 in 7 5 cm wide the blue field for stars is worked in intarsia the stars are made separately and then sewed to afghan afghan is worked in row of ripple pattern stars are worked in rounds
